sentences.en: Foolish as it may seem , Xiangzi began to have doubts about the pervious night.
sentences.cn: 这个既显着胡涂, 祥子也怀疑了昨晚的事儿.

sentences.en: I also release from liability of all my pervious employers or referees furnishing information about me.
sentences.cn: 同时本人承诺不会向提供资料之有关人士及机构追究任何责任.

sentences.en: I'm afraid he's not pervious to our proposal.
sentences.cn: 恐怕他不会接受我们的建议.

sentences.en: Much of this information is picked up by word of mouth from pervious students.
sentences.cn: 很多信息是从以前的学生那里听来的.

sentences.en: Serve it according pervious procedure. server will ensure sugar and spoon is in place for coffee.
sentences.cn: 按照流程服务咖啡, 服务员要确保糖和牛奶及咖啡勺已经准备好.

sentences.en: The doors are pervious to wind.
The pervious asphalt concrete is the paving material more advanced internationally, and just used locally.
sentences.cn: 透水沥青混凝土是国际上较为先进的筑路材料, 国内刚开始采用.

sentences.en: The pervious or impervious boundary conditions are just special cases in this paper.
sentences.cn: 通常所研究的透水或不透水边界条件只是本文的特例.

sentences.en: The whole wealth so swiftly gathered in the paper values of pervious years vanished.
sentences.cn: 在以前的年月中很快积累得来的表现为票面价值的全部财富化为乌有.

sentences.en: You need to state your charging rate and examples of your pervious work before your bid.
sentences.cn: 你需要说明你的收费出价前你的透水率和工作的例子.

sentences.en: Young are readily pervious to new ideas.
Young people are readily pervious to new ideas.
sentences.cn: 青年人乐意接受新思想.

words.tran_cn: 渗透性；[地质][流] 透水性
能被通过的；能接受的；可渗透的

trans.tran_cn: 可被渗透的，可透过的，可通行的，能接受的
